column2: an A.M. Eatery////We wanted to give Snooze another shot to impress! Today we got there at 8:30 to beat the rush... And still waited 20 min before we grabbed a seat at the bar. I had the classic breakfast and a blueberry pancake and hubby had the breakfast pot pie. We had to send his food back because it wasn't warm
column3: and my food was cool. We are big foodies
column4: but decided this place isn't really worth our money and time. We won't be returning. I would much rather go someplace with amazing food
column6: and not so long of a wait. Peace out Snooze! You are overrated
